title: #1525 Just Say What You're Doing
itunes:title: #1525 Just Say What You're Doing
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show talking about CNN's abysmal ratings that some report have dropped by as much as 90%.  They also discuss the news that Discovery Channel is reportedly going to buy CNN and what changes may come as a result of that deal.  Adam also rants about Vice President Harris' refusal to answer even the most basic questions and how crazy we've gotten when it comes to vaccines in regards to kids specifically. Adam also play a clip of him reacting to Dr. Fauci from last September and discuss the current state of effective therapeutics and why they are nearly impossible to procure. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM2
Babbel.com/ADS
Geico.com
